title: Really need help please
body: I was in a game just a minute ago and my i was lagging and i was just trying to play through the lag but then my power went out. Its still not back on yet and im worried that if i miss the game ill get reported. I wouldn't have played a game if i knew my power was going out but i didnt know it would... im just worried my account would get banned please help

replies.body:
You likely won't be **Banned** for disconnecting from a match, but you could earn a Leaverbuster penalty if you had a recent trend of disconnecting from matches.

If you still encounter issues in-game after your power is back on, please let me know what specifically is happening.
